chapter.title: The whole picture
chapter.para: This chapter will help you to understand the basics of the D2S application framework and how to work with it.

section.title: The human resources (HR) sample application
section.para: The human resources application is a simple yet comprehensive business application targetted at managing a company organisation and the employees who work in it. It will demonstrate how D2S can handle a domain model with its relationships and its constraints, present it to the end user for manipulation through various built-in views and actions, handle security through profile management, distribute the frontend across the network, ...
